plot: Terminators come after a family whose unborn daughter plays an important role in the war against the Machines, and Sarah, Cameron, and Derek try to protect them.

Sarah and Cameron set out to rescue a family, named the Fields, in the woods which is on the list of people targeted by Skynet Terminators. Six months later, Derek finds himself trying to save the life of the wounded and very pregnant Mrs. Fields whose child will play a part in the future. Derek also flashes back to his time in the underground resistance with Jesse in 2027 and dealing with a mysterious bio-weapon that the machines use on one hidden facility.—matt-282

Anne Fields and her teenage daughter Lauren contact Derek for assistance. Anne is about to give birth and we learn that she, her husband David and Lauren have been on the run for six months but that they recently had another encounter with a Terminator. In flashbacks, Sarah and Cameron protect the family and convince them that there really are cyborgs from the future out to kill one of them. In flash forwards, we learn exactly why they have to be protected and that they will not only save the human race but Derek's life in particular. Derek flashes back to him and Jesse fighting in the resistance in 2027 and dealing with the sole survivor of a Skynet bio-weapon attack.—garykmcd
